Debug Information¶

Just some arbitrary information about our logging classes, build by using the .. automodule:: directive, which extracts the docstrings from a module.

class mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc.Logged[source]¶
__annotations__ = {'logger': <class 'logging.Logger'>}¶
__dict__ = mappingproxy({'__module__': 'mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc', '__annotations__': {'logger': <class 'logging.Logger'>}, '__dict__': <attribute '__dict__' of 'Logged' objects>, '__weakref__': <attribute '__weakref__' of 'Logged' objects>, '__doc__': None, 'logger': <Logger Logged (DEBUG)>})¶
__module__ = 'mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc'¶
__weakref__¶

list of weak references to the object

logger: Logger = <Logger Logged (DEBUG)>¶
class mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc.LoggedMeta(name: str, bases: Tuple[Type, ...], namespace: Dict[str, Any])[source]¶

metaclass that extends the build in type metaclass with their own version of __new__; it adds attributes to all classes deriving from the abc class that inherits from it

__annotations__ = {}¶
__module__ = 'mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc'¶
static __new__(cls: Type, name: str, bases: Tuple[Type, ...], namespace: Dict[str, Any]) → Logged[source]¶

__new__ interferes with class creation process of type class. Name is the name of the new class being created; bases is a tuple of base classes from which the new class inherits; namespace is a dictionary containing the attributes and methods defined within the class body

class mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc.SomeApplicationClass(v1: int, v2: int)[source]¶

class derived from LoggedMeta: name is the name of this class (SomeApplicationClass), bases are the base classes of this class (Logged), and namespace dictionary includes information about the attributes and methods defined within SomeApplicationClass, for instance {‘logger’: <type ‘logging.Logger’>}

__init__(v1: int, v2: int) → None[source]¶
__module__ = 'mastering_oop.debug.logger_metaclass_and_abc'¶
logger: Logger = <Logger SomeApplicationClass (DEBUG)>¶
